pkgmetadata.longdescription: Go (golang) support for Vim. vim-go comes with sensible predefined settings (e.g. automatic `gofmt` on save), has autocomplete, snippet support, improved syntax highlighting, go toolchain commands, etc. It is highly customizable, and individual features can be toggled easily. vim-go leverages a number of tools developed by the Go community to provide a seamless Vim experience.
